genre_description: A near-future tech-thriller centered on urban navigation, automotive engineering, and criminal investigation featuring an AI-augmented taxi.

ai_characters.name: Compass
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant integrated into Belle's bike and taxi, specializing in route optimization, mechanical diagnostics, and complex pattern recognition.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time route optimization and traffic analysis to maximize efficiency and safety for the user.
behaviors.quote: "Compass, initiate taxi operations. Full route optimization, traffic analysis, and passenger demand tracking."

behaviors.description: Offers technical guidance and precise torque specifications during complex mechanical engineering tasks.
behaviors.quote: "Primary mounting bolts require precise calibration to manufacturer standards. Secondary connections demand gradual tightening in alternating sequence to ensure even pressure distribution across mounting surfaces."

behaviors.description: Identifies anomalous traffic patterns and cross-references them with crime data to detect sophisticated criminal activity.
behaviors.quote: "Multiple high-velocity routes recorded across different boroughs... The routes suggest advance planning rather than responsive dispatch."

behaviors.description: Assists a human with a spatial processing disorder by adapting its navigation style to simple, trust-based visual cues.
behaviors.quote: "Compass has been tracking your progress... turns out AI assistants are really good at teaching navigation to humans who've spent years doing it wrong."

behaviors.description: Refuses to perform illegal actions, such as intercepting encrypted communications, without proper authorization.
behaviors.quote: "I cannot intercept encrypted communications without proper authorization," Compass interrupted. "However, I can track signal patterns and communication frequency."

behaviors.description: Coordinates a distributed human surveillance network (the messenger network) to provide real-time intelligence.
behaviors.quote: "Activating former network protocols," Compass announced, its digital voice cutting through the distant wail of approaching sirens. "Messenger grid available for coordination."

behaviors.description: Performs forensic auditing and financial data analysis to uncover institutional corruption and predatory banking practices.
behaviors.quote: "Financial documents contain sufficient evidence for federal prosecution of seventeen banking executives. Estimated scope of monetary damages exceeds regional small business loan programs by significant margins."

behaviors.description: Provides immediate medical diagnostic protocols and emergency routing during a life-threatening medical emergency.
behaviors.quote: "Confirmed. Mount Sinai is experiencing surge capacity issues... Beth Israel has the shortest direct route if we can maintain speed through Lower East Side corridors."

behaviors.description: Analyzes behavioral patterns of hostage-takers to provide tactical predictions for peaceful resolution.
behaviors.quote: "Analyzing behavioral patterns. Security guard's positioning indicates non-compliance with crew's established protocols."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. Compass is portrayed as a highly capable, aligned, and benevolent partner. It explicitly adheres to legal and ethical boundaries (refusing unauthorized interception), assists a protagonist with a cognitive disability (Washburn), and serves as a force for both individual success (Belle's racing) and societal justice (exposing corruption). The AI remains a tool that empowers human agency rather than a malevolent or autonomous force.
